tool_description: Queries available spectrum bands and licensing information for a given geographic region and operator, returning frequency allocations and usage restrictions.

region_code.description: ISO country/region code for spectrum regulations

error_messages: Invalid region code: Use valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes.
Operator not found: Verify operator_id is registered in the specified region.
Unsupported frequency band: Use standard cellular band designations (e.g., 850MHz, 1900MHz, 2.1GHz).
usage: Provide region_code and operator_id to retrieve all licensed spectrum, or specify frequency_bands array for targeted queries.

available_bands.description: List of available frequency bands with bandwidth

expiry_dates.description: License expiration dates in ISO date format
